name: Glood! Online
description:
Glood! is an online multiplayer arcade game where you need to collect as many stars as possible. The thing is, there are others that will fight you for the stars! Throw and time your crazy cola so that it explodes right in your enemies' face and pushes them out of your way, climb walls and make sick jumps, may the best consumer goods win!

Created by:

  • Muhammad Iqbal Kalevi (Lead Programmer)
  • Hafez Alvanro (Lead Designer)
  • Muhammad Hafiizul Kirom (Visual Artist) 
  • Novian Ilham Ramadhan (Project Manager) 
  • Wahyu Rafi' Adi Wicaksono (UI/UX Designer)

For DGA-IGSI GameJam 2021 - "Unconventional Weapon"

*All assets are made by us. Online using Photon Unity Networking 2.
